import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Layout from '../Components/Layout' import voting from '../Ethereum/voting' import {Card, Grid, Button, Table, Link} from 'semantic-ui-react' class votingInstance extends Component{ static getInitialProps = async () =>{ return{ address : voting.options.address } } render(){ const { Header,Row, HeaderCell, Body } = Table; return( {this.props.address} Election Address This the Address on which the Election Contract has been deployed
Candidate's ID Candidate's Name Candidate's Party
); } } export default votingInstance;
